dict.string: Default format will be used if custom format is left empty.
Sample format: [GM]-[GD] [WD] [LM]-[LD] [S] Sample output: 7-7 Saturday May-19th Minor heat

Parameters: [GY]: Gregorian year [GM]: Gregorian month [GD]: Gregorian day [WD]: Weekday [LM]: Lunar month [LD]: Lunar day [HY]: Year heavenly stem [EY]: Year earthly branch [HM]: Month heavenly stem [EM]: Month earthly branch [HD]: Day heavenly stem [ED]: Day earthly branch [L]: Leap year title [C]: Constellation [Z]: Chinese zodiac [S]: Solar terms
